Title: Relates to discounting uninsured dental services
Summary: Prevents an insurance or managed care company from including in any insurance or managed care contract any provisions that require a dentist to provide services to a covered person at a fee set by or at a fee subject to the approval of the insurer or managed care entity unless such services are covered under the person's dental plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to discounting uninsured dental services
